<title level="1" right="Action">[Disgusting Gallop](/Actions.aspx?ID=1271) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Disease" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=46" />
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 78</row>

</column>

---

The zombie mount Strides twice, spraying putrid spittle as it runs. Once during this movement, choose a creature adjacent to the zombie mount. The spittle splashes on it, and the creature must succeed at a Fortitude save or be [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). The creature is then temporarily immune to the spittle for 24 hours. This uses a trained DC using the zombie mount's Constitution modifier, or an expert DC if the mount is specialized.
name: Disgusting Gallop
